ai.grakn.graph.internal

Class GraknOrientDBGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • ai.grakn.graph.internal.AbstractGraknGraph<org.apache.tinkerpop.gremlin.orientdb.OrientGraph>
      • ai.grakn.graph.internal.GraknOrientDBGraph
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GraknGraph, GraknAdmin, AutoCloseable

    public class GraknOrientDBGraph
extends AbstractGraknGraph<org.apache.tinkerpop.gremlin.orientdb.OrientGraph>

    A Grakn Graph using OrientGraph as a vendor backend.

    Wraps up a OrientGraph as a method of storing the Grakn Graph object Model. With this vendor some issues to be aware of: 1. AbstractGraknGraph.isConceptModified(ConceptImpl) always returns true due to methods not available yet on orient's side. 2. Indexing is done across labels as opposed to global indices

    Author:
    fppt
